// import {isNumber,isString} from "lodash";
import {darken as pDarken, lighten as pLighten, parseToRgb, rgba, mix, rgb as toRGB, getLuminance, parseToHsl, saturate as pSaturate, setLightness } from "polished";
 
const operators = {
  "+": (v1,v2)=>v1 + v2,
  "-": (v1,v2)=>v1 - v2,
  "*": (v1,v2)=>v1 * v2,
  "/": (v1,v2)=>v1 / v2,
};
 
const rxCssValue = /^(-?[0-9.]+)([a-z%]+)?$/;
 
export function parseCssValue(v) {
  const match = `${v}`.match(rxCssValue) || [null,"0",""];
  return [parseFloat(match[1]),match[2] || ""];
}
 
export function applyUnitIfRequired(value,unit) {
  var [v,u] = parseCssValue(value);
  Eif (!u) { u = unit; }
  return `${v}${u}`;
}
 
export function unitMath(s1,op,s2) {
 
  const [v1,u1] = parseCssValue(s1);
 
  const [v2] = parseCssValue(s2);
 
  return `${operators[op](v1,v2)}${u1}`;
 
}
 
export function darken(color,perc) {
  return pDarken(perc / 100, color);
}
 
export function lighten(color,perc) {
  return pLighten(perc / 100, color);
}
 
export function lightenRelative(color,perc,maxLightness = 1) {
  const { lightness } = parseToHsl(color);
  Iif (lightness > maxLightness) { return color; }
  const lightDiff = 1 - lightness;
  let newLightness = lightness + (perc * (lightDiff / 100));
  Iif (newLightness > maxLightness) {
    newLightness = maxLightness;
  }
  
  return setLightness(newLightness,color);
}
 
export function darkenRelative(color, perc, minLightness = 0) {
  const { lightness } = parseToHsl(color);
  Iif (lightness < minLightness) { return color; }
  const lightDiff = 1 - lightness;
  let newLightness = lightness - (perc * (lightDiff / 100));
  Iif (newLightness < minLightness) {
    newLightness = minLightness;
  }
 
  return setLightness(newLightness, color);
}
 
export function darkenOrLighten(color,perc,threshold = 0.15) {
  const {lightness} = parseToHsl(color);
  if (lightness > threshold) {
    return darken(color,perc);
  }
  return lighten(color,perc);
}
 
export function lightenOrDarken(color,perc,threshold = 0.85) {
  const {lightness} = parseToHsl(color);
  if (lightness > threshold) {
    return darken(color,perc);
  }
  return lighten(color,perc);
}
 
const EPS = 1e-7;
 
export {getLuminance};
 
export function setLuminance(amount, color) {
  const { alpha = 1 } = parseToRgb(color);
  let rgb;
  Iif (amount === 0) {
    rgb = rgba(0, 0, 0, alpha);
  }
  else Iif (amount === 1) {
    rgb = rgba(255, 255, 255, alpha);
  }
  else {
    let maxIteration = 20;
    const test = (color1, color2) => {
      const mixed = mix(0.5, color1, color2);
      const mixedLuminance = getLuminance(mixed);
      if (Math.abs(amount - mixedLuminance) < EPS || !maxIteration--) { //eslint-disable-line no-plusplus
        return mixed;
      }
      if (mixedLuminance > amount) {
        return test(color1, mixed);
      }
      return test(mixed, color2);
    };
    rgb = getLuminance(color) > amount
      ? test('#000', color)
      : test(color, '#fff');
  }
  return rgb;
}
 
export function getContrast(color1,color2) {
  const contrast = (getLuminance(color1) + 0.05) / (getLuminance(color2) + 0.05);
  return contrast < 1 ? (1 / contrast) : contrast;
}
 
export function makeReadable(color,bgColor = "#ffffff", contrastThreshold = 4.5) {
 
  const contrast = getContrast(color,bgColor);
 
  if (contrast >= contrastThreshold) {
    return color;
  }
 
  let minLum = ((contrastThreshold * (getLuminance(bgColor) + 0.05)) - 0.05);
 
  if (minLum > 1) {
    minLum = (((1 / contrastThreshold) * (getLuminance(bgColor) + 0.05)) - 0.05);
  }
 
  return setLuminance(minLum,color);
 
}
 
window.makeReadable = makeReadable;
 
export function solidifyOpacity(color, bgColor = "#ffffff") {
  const {red,green,blue,alpha = 1} = parseToRgb(color);
  let solid = color;
  if (alpha !== 1) {
    solid = mix(alpha,toRGB(red,green,blue),bgColor);
  }
  return solid;
}
 
export function bestContrast(bgColor = "#ffffff",colors = ["#ffffff","#333333"]) {
  let bestColor = "#333333";
  let bestContr = 0;
  colors.forEach((color)=>{
    const normColor = solidifyOpacity(color,bgColor);
 
    const contrast = getContrast(bgColor,normColor);
    if (contrast > bestContr) {
      bestContr = contrast;
      bestColor = color;
    }
  });
 
  return bestColor;
}
 
export function saturate(color,perc,relative) {
  const {saturation} = parseToHsl(color);
  const amt = perc / 100;
  return pSaturate((relative === "relative" ? (saturation * amt) : amt),color);
}

  white-space:nowrap;
  overflow:hidden;
  text-overflow:ellipsis;
`;
